summary: A young girl meets the doppelganger of her deceased boyfriend and now has a chance to find the people who have murdered him.
cast: Hrithik Roshan|Ameesha Patel|Anupam Kher|Dalip Tahil|Mohnish Bahl|Ashish Vidyarthi|Satish Shah|Farida Jalal|Tanaaz Currim Irani|Payal Malhotra|Rajesh Tandon|Vrajesh Hirjee|Ram Mohan|Shama Deshpande|Kamal Singh|Irin|Farhad Nathani|Asha Patel|Abhishek Sharma|Master Farzaan Dastoor|Chhaya|Johnny Lever|Kamya Punjabi|Surendra Rahi
title: Reencuentro con el destino
